newsitem.title: USA: Clinton Gas completes merger with Enron unit.
newsitem.headline: Clinton Gas completes merger with Enron unit.

text.p: Clinton Gas Systems Inc said on Wednesday that it merged with Joint Energy Development Investments LP, an affiliate of Enron Corp.

Holders of outstanding shares of Clinton Gas common stock will receive $6.75 per share, the company said. The merger will cause the delisting of Clinton Gas common stock which had been traded on the National Market Tier of The NASDAQ Stock Market, the company said.
Clinton Gas will now be known as CGAS Inc and its exploration unit will become CGAS Exploration Inc, the company said.
